Andrew's Assistant.description: A Discord Bot that can do a lot of things, including playing music, searching for memes, and more!

Andrew's Website.description: A website that I made to showcase my projects and to learn more about web development.

QuickChat.description: A chat app that works on the same network as the server with TCP. Easy to use & no setup required

News Summarizer.description: A app that summarizes news articles with Server/Client Architecture. Uses PyTorch for Inference.
